descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img13/736/nxtm.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[B]All of the followers will be naked when first put in game!!! For Freyja, if you have the gear mods, just recruit her and she will eqiup the gold-chain nocturnal robe. For both Odins and Thor, you must trade the armor to them![/B]

NOTE TO MODDERS: 
I don\'t have permission to use any of your mods, but considering downloaders MUST download your mods for them to show up in my mod, I consider it free advertising, not re-distributing. I hope you all feel the same way.

NOTE TO DOWNLOADERS:
Only the pictures that I have uploaded with RED WRITTING on them is how these followers look in-game. The ones without red writing that I have uploaded show what I wanted the followers to look like. However, for some reason Creation Kit would NOT save Freyja\'s makeup, and I could not get Valfar\'s beard to work in CK at all.

[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img833/2217/54f7.jpg[/img][/center]

Here are 4 followers who will follow you and protect you. Inspired and based on the Norse Gods in Norse Paganism (modern day Odinism). 

Odin. The Valfather. The Chief deity. The Terror of the Gods. The Troll Slayer!!! Odin is the god of war, wisdom, fury, battle, victory and death. He is the father of Thor and the leader of the Norse Gods. In this mod I have made 2 versions of Odin. A melee version (Odin Trollslayer) and a wanderer version (Odin Valfather). The Warrior uses melee and the wanderer uses magic. Odin is NOT a potential spouse.

Thor. The son of Odin. He is a god associated with thunder, lightning, storms, oak trees, strength, the protection of mankind, hallowing, healing and fertility. He is not as strong as Odin, but will protect you with all of his might. Thor IS marriageable.

Freyja. the fairest of all the goddesses. She is associated with love, sexuality, beauty, fertility, gold, war and death. She will follow and protect you with all of her power. She is a magic class, but has the stats to efficently use any weapon!

[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img534/66/2evu.jpg[/img][/center]

Not all of these files are actual requirements, but to get the followers to look how they do in the screenshots, you must get all of these mods.

Odin Trollslayer:
Required:
ApachiiSkyHair - Male Hair: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?

Gear he is wearing in Screenshots:
Trollsbane armor: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35793/?
Bandits Eyepatch: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1874//?
Royal Crown 2: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34209/?

Also with the warrior version of Odin, if you want to get more into the roleplay aspect of Odin, the JaysusSwords mod adds Gungnir (a sword made from the tip of Odin\'s spear). That can be found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1002/?

Odin Valfather:
Required:
ApachiiSkyHair - Male Hair: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?

Gear he is wearing in screenshots:
Bandits Eyepatch: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1874//?
Gandalf Hat - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4198//?
Gandalf Hat Non-replacer version (Adds Gandalf Follower) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28432//?
Craftable Greybeard Robes - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11524/?

The Gandalf hat will replace Jester hat in-game. However, the Gandalf follower mod will add a standalone version, but also a Gandalf follower in the mage college.

Freyja:
I\'m not 100% sure if these are required, being new to making follower mods. I personally use the Diamonized UNP body + UNP Blessed Body. I\'m not sure if both of those are required or not, but I\'m putting them under the required section.

Required:
Diamonized UNP body: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?
UNP Blessed Body: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=37900
Apachii hair: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?

Gear she is wearing in screenshots:
Nocturnal Dresscode- Gold: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8042//?
Buyable Nocturnal Clothing - Keyed to Wearable: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8229//?

Thor:
Required:
None! He is made from pure vanilla!

Gear is he wearing in screenshots:
Heart of Thunder Asgard Edition: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25709//?

[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img443/4866/n1ug.jpg[/img][/center]

All 4 followers are level 120, but have different stats. On a fresh game they will be over-powered, but at level 81 they won\'t be, however they are gods, so they SHOULD be over-powered.

Odin Troll Slayer:
level 100 one-handed
100 two-handed
100 heavy armor
100 smithing
100 archery
100 block
All Other skills are minimal

Odin Valfather:
100 alchemy
100 speech
100 alteration
100 conjuration
100 destruction
100 illusion
100 restoration
100 enchanting
All other skills are minimal

Thor:
100 one-handed
100 block
100 heavy armor
100 light armor
100 speech
All other skills are minimal

Freyja has healing spells, but I do not have the knowledge to script her to use them. If anyone here knows how and wishes to do so, go ahead. I\'ll upload the scripted version and give you credit. She has stats in almost every skill to makeup for her lack of spells.

Freyja:
100 one-handed
100 two-handed
100 block
100 heavy armor
100 light armor
100 speech
95 alteration
85 conjuration
90 destruction
85 illusion
100 restoration
85 enchanting
All other skills are minimal

[center][img]http://img856.imageshack.us/img856/9408/8prz.jpg[/img][/center]

If Freyja equips the normal black Nocturnal\'s robe, you did NOT download the gold chain replacer. (Link found in requirements section)

If Freyja doesn\'t equip ANYTHING, you did not download the buyable/wearable Nocturnal robes mod. (also found in requirements section)

Odin Valfather seems to not equip his staff. Try taking it away, then giving it back to him to fix it. I have not tried doing this, and thus do not know if it\'ll make him use it. If not, he always has icespells at his disposal. He can use all ice spells from Novice - Master.

[center][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img42/6862/mzul.jpg[/IMG][/center]

V0.3 Nexus Release (Freyja Only)
V0.4 Added Odin(warrior version), fixed a texture folder with Freyja
V0.5 No changes to existing files. Added Odin (Wanderer Version)
V0.6 No changes to existing files. Added Odin (Wanderer Version), Thor and All In One


[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img30/647/adl9.jpg[/img][/center]

Bethesda for creating Skyrim & the Creation Kit
Apachii for creating ApachiiSkyHair
MrLenski for creating Nocturnal Dresscode
aloneinshadow for creating the buyable/wearable Nocturnal clothing mod
Ceekay9 for creating the bandits eyepatch
hothtropper44 for creating the Trollsbane Armor & Weapon
cyric79 for creating the royal crown
DigitalLion for creating the Gandalf Hat
scotaiel for creating the Non-replacer Gandalf Hat
KillweSnowmanX for creating craftable Greybeard Robes
OminousVoice for creating Thor\'s armor and weapon
The Gods for giving inspiration to put them into games.
And anyone else who I haven\'t mentioned! (sorry if I missed you! Just tell me and I\'ll fix it!)
author: Saint Grimm
